PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FlowInstrumentTypeThermometer
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: A device that reads and displays a temperature value at a point.

PropertyDef.Name: ThermometerType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the means by which temperature is displayed.

PropertyDef.Name: DisplaySize
PropertyDef.Definition: The physical size of the display. In the case of a stem thermometer, this will be the length of the stem. For a dial thermometer, it will be the diameter of the dial.
